pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computing Essential Biodiversity Variables from Global Forest Change Data // Metrics and statistics of Essential Biodiversity Variables are computed by processing Global Forest Change data (Hansen et al., 2013) doi:10.1126/science.1244693 , Canopy Cover data (Sexton et al., 2013) doi:10.1080/17538947.2013.786146, and polygon geometries (e.g., GADM, see https://gadm.org/).
